Compression.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: OFF | SNAPPY  
Update requires: No interruption

BucketArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 16  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z0-9-]*):s3:::.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Prefix.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512

TimestreamTableArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z0-9-]*):timestream:[a-zA-Z0-9-]+:[0-9]{12}:database\/[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]+\/table\/[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: Yes
